attributes.action: Deport any migrant who is guilty of committing a sexual offence
attributes.additional_details: We urge the Government to pass this law so that any and all migrants found guilty of committing sexual offences are deported from British soil. We believe our citizens’ safety should be the top priority.
attributes.background: Pass a law which automatically deports any migrant who is identified and guilty of committing any sexual offences, including sexual activity with a child.
